text: Freight Tycoon is a simulation strategy computer game focused around transporting goods via small and large tonnage trucks. The game was published by the Russian 1C Company. ==References== ==External links== *Freight Tycoon on the 1C Company website Category:2006 video games Category:Windows games Category:Windows-only games Category:Business simulation games Category:Video games developed in Russia
title: Freight Tycoon
